sentences.sContent: Going back to work after a month travelling in China was bound to be an anticlimax.
sentences.sCn: 在中国旅行了一个月之后再回去工作必然很没劲。

synos.tran: 突降法；虎头蛇尾；令人扫兴的结尾

remMethod.val: anti (相反) + climax (高潮， 结局) → 与期望相反的结局 → 突降法

words.tran: 虎头蛇尾的；突降法的；突减的

trans.tranCn: 突降法；虎头蛇尾；令人扫兴的结尾
trans.tranOther: a situation or event that does not seem exciting because it happens after something that was much better
